name: Lust School
description:
Visual novel style adult game
Go through your normal day to day school life but with a twist, you actually get the girls in this universe ;)

Features

  • 7 Characters to meet and interact with
  • 3 H scenes (About to be increased)
  • PC Features (Replay past events, Gallery, DvD Player, Cam show...)
  • Choice system (You choose your path in the story)
  • ANIMATED sex scenes

Official site: https://lustschool.net

Discord:  https://discord.gg/ushj2e8

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lustschool
